Package com.atgenomix.seqslab.piper.plugin.api

Interface Operator

All Superinterfaces:
Closable, OperatorPipelineV3
All Known Subinterfaces:
Collector, Executor, Formatter, Loader, Partitioner, SupportsCLI, SupportsLocal, SupportsParallel, SupportsReadWrite, SupportsRemote, SupportsSQL, Writer
@DeveloperApi public interface Operator extends OperatorPipelineV3, Closable
An operator that processes Spark Dataset of Row and produces a new Dataset of row. Multiple operators chained together is the operator pipeline that automates in-memory data processing specific to an input or output file or tabular data in a workflow task. Operations available in operator pipeline are divided into localization, computation, and delocalization.
Localization loads datasets from a source (such as blob storage) and optionally transforms the dataset to meet the requirements of distributed task commands.
Computation passes distributed dataset of rows to task command and executes the task command (such as executable tool and SQL).
Delocalization collects a file or dataset outputed from task command and saves to a destination (such as blob storage).
See Also:

    • getOperatorContext

      default OperatorContext getOperatorContext() throws Exception
      Get the OperatorContext containing a list of properties in the form of NamedValue objects associated with this operator object. Operator context can store state properties that will be passed to downstream operators.

      operator context
